nodes.text: The Canyon Dune Turn, also known as the Tusken Turn, was a sharply curving canyon on Tatooine along the Mos Espa Raceway, just outside the Laguna Caves. A vengeful tribe of Tusken Raiders known for shooting at passing racers was camped on the ridge overlooking the canyon.
It was here that Teemto Pagalies lost control of his podracer and crashed in the Boonta Eve Classic race of 32 BBY.
